items.question: Why in the world did this great show not carry on with more seasons and episodes. It is a great show and should be brought back for many more seasons.
items.answer: From Wikipedia: "In September 2020, Soderbergh confirmed that a new season of The Knick is in development led by Barry Jenkins and André Holland, who would return as his character Dr. Algernon C. Edwards, and that original creators Jack Amiel and Michael Begler have written a pilot episode."
